feed.title: BIP [104]: Replace Transaction Fees with Data, Discussion Draft 0.2.9

entry.title: BIP [104]: Replace Transaction Fees with Data, Discussion Draft 0.2.9
entry.summary: Ahmed proposed a long-term solution to replace mining rewards and transaction fees. He shared a discussion draft of BIP 104, which is available on Google Drive. The proposal aims to address the issue of decreasing mining rewards and increasing transaction fees over time. Feedback and views are welcome on the proposal.
